hero.headline: Work Flows Better
hero.subheadline: The project management platform that gets out of your way. Boards, timelines, chat, and automations — all in one place, with zero learning curve.

services.headline: Everything Your Team Needs
services.subheadline: Six core features that replace a dozen disconnected tools. No more tab-switching, no more lost context.

items.title: Task Boards
items.description: Kanban, list, and timeline views that sync in real time. Drag tasks between columns, set priorities, and filter by assignee, label, or due date. Switch views without losing context.

items.title: Time Tracking
items.description: One-click timers built into every task. See where hours go with weekly reports, billable vs. non-billable breakdowns, and client-ready exports. No third-party integration needed.

items.title: Team Chat
items.description: Threaded conversations attached to projects and tasks. Mention teammates, share files, and make decisions without leaving the context of the work. Replaces Slack for project communication.

items.title: File Sharing
items.description: Drag and drop files directly into tasks and conversations. 10 GB storage on Free, unlimited on Team. Version history, preview for 50+ file types, and one-click client sharing links.

items.title: Automations
items.description: If-then rules that handle the busywork. Auto-assign tasks on creation, move cards when status changes, send Slack notifications on deadlines, and 40+ more triggers and actions.

items.title: Analytics
items.description: Dashboards that show team velocity, bottlenecks, and workload distribution at a glance. Burndown charts, cycle time tracking, and customizable reports you can share with stakeholders.

items.quote: We switched from Jira to Flowdeck in a week. Onboarding took one meeting instead of a month. Our sprint velocity went up 30% in the first quarter — mostly because people actually use the tool now.
The built-in time tracking alone saved us $400/month we were spending on Toggl. Having timers right on the task card means my team actually tracks their hours without being reminded.
I run a 6-person startup and we use Flowdeck for everything — product roadmap, bug tracking, hiring pipeline, even our content calendar. It adapts to whatever we throw at it.
The automations feature is what sold us. We set up rules that auto-assign QA tasks, notify clients on milestone completion, and archive completed sprints. Saves us 5+ hours a week.

pricing.headline: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subheadline: Start free, upgrade when you need more. No hidden fees, no per-feature charges, no surprise overages.

tiers.name: Pro

tiers.name: Team

features.text: Billable time tracking with client exports

items.question: Is there really a free plan?
items.answer: Yes, completely free for up to 5 team members with unlimited tasks and projects. No credit card required, no trial period, no feature lockouts that make it unusable. We built the free tier to be genuinely useful, not just a demo.

items.question: Can I import from Jira, Asana, or Trello?
items.answer: Yes. We have one-click importers for Jira, Asana, Trello, Monday.com, and ClickUp. Your projects, tasks, assignees, and labels come over automatically. Most teams are fully migrated within an hour.

items.question: How does billing work?
items.answer: Plans are billed per user, per month (or annually at a 20% discount). You only pay for active users — if someone leaves your team, they're removed from billing immediately. No annual contracts required on any plan.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Flowdeck is SOC 2 Type II certified with 256-bit encryption at rest and in transit. We run on AWS with daily backups, 99.9% uptime SLA, and optional SSO/SAML on the Team plan. Your data is never used for training or sold to third parties.

items.question: What integrations do you support?
items.answer: Native integrations with Slack, GitHub, GitLab, Google Workspace, Microsoft 365, Figma, and Zapier. Our REST API and webhooks let you connect anything else. API documentation is public and available on our developer portal.

items.question: Can I try Pro or Team features before committing?
items.answer: Every paid plan starts with a 14-day free trial with full access to all features. No credit card required to start. If you decide not to upgrade, you'll automatically move to the Free plan — no data loss, no disruption.
